name: Cubgeon
description:
Cubgeon is a platformer developed by Sence in early 2023

=THE DEVELOPEMENT OF THE GAME=

The developement of Cubgeon started in early 2023 as a school project.

The game got 4 Closed Pre-Beta Tests before the first real beta to be released on the 29th of Marth 2023.

The game was developed in Scratch and was meant to be a simple demo, but ended up as the 2nd official project released by Sence.

=WHAT IS CUBGEON?=

Cubgeon is a simple yet difficult free platformer to challenge casuals and pros in the platformer space

=ABOUT SENCE=

Sence is a 13-year-old Dutch game developer, Youtuber and music producer.
